Atama ofe bụ ofe akwụkwọ nri na nkwụ nke sitere na ndị Efik nke Cross River Steeti na South South Naijiria. A maara ya nke ọma n'etiti Cross River na Akwa Ibom Steeti People of Naijiria. A na-eji mkpụrụ nkwụ eme ofe ahụ; mmanụ a na-enweta site na mkpụrụ nkwụ bụ ihe a na-eji eme ofe ahụ
A na-esi ofe Atama ma jiri ụdị anụ, azụ kpọrọ nkụ na mgbe ụfọdụ periwinkle sie ya. Ihe eji akwadebe ya gụnyere: mkpụrụ nkwụ ọhụrụ, yabasị, nnu, na ndị ọzọ.
